articles.title: Planet Nugg Reopens with 'Out-of-This-World Weedkends' All Summer Long
articles.summary: Planet Nugg, a cannabis dispensary, is launching a loyalty rewards app, faster checkout, and a smoother shopping flow. To celebrate the reopening and welcome the summer season, Planet Nugg is launching 'Weedkends', a summer-long series. Additionally, Planet Nugg is introducing 'Puffer Pods' at the upgraded Bud Bar.

articles.title: New Dragon Ball Video Game Celebrates Trailer With Contest & Network Test
articles.author: Coming Soon
articles.summary: Bandai Namco and Ganbarion are holding a network test for the new Dragon Ball game, 'Dragon Ball Gekishin Squadra'. This test allows players to experience the game. 'Dragon Ball Gekishin Squadra' is Dragon Ball franchise's first team-oriented battle.

articles.title: Planet Nugg Reopens with 'Out-of-This-World Weedkends' All Summer Long
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Planet Nugg reopened on June 11 with upgraded operations, a new loyalty rewards app, and faster checkout. To celebrate, they are launching 'Weedkends' featuring brand pop-ups and weekend-only drops. They are also introducing 'Puffer Pods' at the Bud Bar, offering customers an interactive way to explore cannabis flower.

articles.title: Did you get tripped up by Spotify 'Create'?
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Roku launched its 2025 TV lineup. Motorola's Moto Tag tracker received a UWB upgrade. Microsoft and Asus revealed the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X. Twelve South released the PowerCord, a premium braided all-in-one USB-C charger. Google's new battery health feature is coming to more Pixel devices. Samsung will begin deleting accounts that have been inactive for over two years starting July 31, 2025.

articles.title: First Real Images: Unveiling [Brand Name] Photography
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 is anticipated to bring significant upgrades to the foldable phone market. Leaks suggest improvements in hinge design, leading to a thinner and more durable device. The device is expected to have a larger external screen and advancements in display technology, with a potential release around July or August 2025.

articles.title: Shhh Silk Launches the World's First AI-Powered Sleep Concierge
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Shhh Silk has launched The Sleep Concierge, an AI-powered sleep ritual assistant designed to transform nightly routines. This tool provides personalized wind-down routines, insights inspired by sleep science, and ritual recommendations. The Sleep Concierge is accessible via OpenAI's ChatGPT platform.

articles.title: Mattel and OpenAI form new partnership
articles.author: Laurel Lee
articles.summary: Mattel is collaborating with OpenAI to introduce AI technology into its products, with the first AI-powered product planned for launch later this year. This initiative aims to enhance play experiences while prioritizing innovation, privacy, and safety.

articles.title: Trump-branded phones? New legal move suggests he might be 'serious'
articles.author: Matthew Chapman
articles.summary: DTTM Operations LLC, managing trademarks for Donald Trump, has applied for a trademark using Trump's name and the term 'T1' for telecommunications services. The application covers mobile phones, cases, battery chargers, wireless telephone services, and potentially retail stores, indicating a potential Trump-branded phone or cellular service that could compete with existing providers.

articles.title: Pebble's Spiritual Sequel: New Smartwatch Ships July
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The rebooted Pebble smartwatch aims to make a splash by preserving simplicity and practicality, while focusing on essential functions. This new version intends to support the existing ecosystem of Pebble apps, highlighting an improved user experience, long battery life, and community support.

articles.title: This $5 Blush on Amazon Is a Hit with Nurses Who Work 9+ Hours
articles.author: Jasmine Washington
articles.summary: Revolution Beauty launched Super Dewy Liquid Blush that is available on Amazon for $5. The blush is known for its creamy, hydrating formula providing a natural-looking appearance with buildable and highly pigmented color. Customers report that it is long-lasting and gives skin a healthy glow.

articles.title: Social Media Messaging Chatbot Tool – Reviewed By Our Experts
articles.author: Daniel Aiyegbusi
articles.summary: ManyChat offers a platform for automating customer communication across multiple channels, including Facebook Messenger, Instagram, WhatsApp, SMS, and web chat. Its key features include a visual flow builder, audience segmentation, and integrations with platforms like Shopify and HubSpot. The platform provides a free tier and a Pro plan at $15 monthly, and is suited for e-commerce businesses, digital marketers, and content creators.

articles.title: A former Google veteran used vibe coding to test a cat-purring app. It was fun, but wasn't purrfect.
articles.author: Alistair Barr
articles.summary: Google's CEO Sundar Pichai and a former Google employee are testing Replit, an AI coding tool. The employee used Replit to create a 'cat purring app' prototype, which could be launched based on initial query and answering questions. The author also uses Bolt.new, another AI coding tool.

articles.title: Rekt--The Viral Crypto-Native, Zero Alc Sparkling Water With a Cult Following--Hits 7-Eleven Shelves for the First Time
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Rekt Drinks, a Web3-powered sparkling water brand, is launching its Liquidated Lime cans in select 7-Eleven stores in Southern California.  This retail debut includes a promotion where the first 50 customers buying a four-pack receive $REKT Coin worth approximately $100. The launch follows the brand's success with online drops, incorporating a rewards system that converts purchases and social activity into $REKT Coin and digital collectibles.

articles.title: Review: Switch 2 a significant upgrade, but the extra muscle comes at a cost
articles.author: Moosejaw Today
articles.summary: In 2017, Nintendo launched the Switch, an innovative video game system. The Switch can seamlessly transform from a home console to a handheld gaming device. Its attractive price point made it a hit.

articles.title: Mould covered the bathroom of my new home – I felt sick but banished it in minutes with a single buy, it's the best
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Mould Magic gel is introduced as a product that effectively removes mould and prevents its return. This formula comes in a tube with a nozzle and can be applied to different surfaces. The product can be bought online for £9.95.

articles.title: Mould covered the bathroom of my new home – I felt sick but banished it in minutes with a single buy, it's the best
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Nicola showcased how Mould Magic gel effectively removes mould, especially on bathroom grout, and prevents its return. The product, available for £9.95, is applied with a nozzle for hard-to-reach areas, and users have reported successful results on various surfaces, including washing machines and painted walls.

articles.title: Mould covered the bathroom of my new home – I felt sick but banished it in minutes with a single buy, it's the best
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Nicola, a cleaning expert, used Mould Magic to effectively remove mould from grout and walls in her bathroom. The product, available online, is applied as a gel, left for a couple of hours, and then wiped away, with the cleaning expert stating that the mould never comes back

articles.title: Google to End Android Instant Apps by December 2025 Due to Low Usage
articles.summary: Google will discontinue Android Instant Apps by the end of 2025, citing low usage and engagement. Introduced in 2016 and available in early 2017, the service allowed users to try parts of an app without full installation but struggled to gain traction due to developer challenges.

articles.title: iRobot Debuts New Marketing Campaign Roomba®. Made for This
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: iRobot introduced new Roomba vacuums and 2-in-1 vacuums and mops with advanced features earlier this year. The company also announced that additional new products are slated for introduction later this year. iRobot is launching a new multi-platform marketing campaign featuring the tagline "Roomba. Made for This".

articles.title: iRobot Debuts New Marketing Campaign Roomba®. Made for This
articles.author: i Robot Corporation
articles.summary: iRobot Corp. is launching a multi-platform marketing campaign, starting June 16, 2025, featuring television spots with the tagline "Roomba. Made for This." These spots will air on premium streaming services in the U.S. This campaign is the first one since 2023.

articles.title: iRobot Debuts New Marketing Campaign Roomba®. Made for This
articles.author: i Robot Corporation
articles.summary: iRobot Corp. is launching a multi-platform marketing campaign, its first since 2023. The campaign, featuring the tagline "Roomba. Made for This," will begin airing on streaming services in the U.S. starting June 16.

articles.title: Maria Clara Sparkling Sangria: A bold, bubbly twist on a classic favorite
articles.summary: Maria Clara Sangria launched Maria Clara Sparkling Sangria, a bubbly version of its classic sangria, packaged in a 330-milliliter aluminum can. It is available exclusively at 7-Eleven stores nationwide.

articles.title: Skip the Socks, Hand Over a PURA Soda This Father's Day, PURA Salutes the Everyday Heroes Who Keep It Simple, Real, and Refreshing
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: PURA Beverages is promoting its product line for Father's Day, including low-sugar sodas, flavored hydration drinks, and a new colorful kids' range. These products are designed for families seeking healthier refreshment options.

articles.title: Watch a Tesla with FSD ignore a stop sign and run over a child-sized dummy.
articles.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
articles.summary: A company is preparing to launch its robotaxi service later this month.

articles.title: Business Spotlight: Freeze-dried dreams and fizzy delights fuel Avenue117's anniversary celebration
articles.author: Shereen Siewert
articles.summary: Avenue117 launched Fizz Factory, a new line of dirty sodas, created by owner's daughter, Kate. Fizz Factory is available in the store and at mobile events. To celebrate the anniversary of the storefront, Avenue117 is highlighting its Fizz Factory Dirty Sodas with upcoming special tasting evenings.

articles.title: Why Is PLG Important, And How To Increase Sales Through It?
articles.author: Neel Achary
articles.summary: Companies are employing Product-Led Growth (PLG) strategies to introduce and promote their products and services. These strategies include offering free trials, similar to YouTube Premium and LinkedIn Premium, using freemium models to engage users without mandatory subscriptions, and offering cross-sells based on user behavior and product usage to encourage the adoption of new features.

articles.title: AI-powered Lawn Mower by Segway Freed Up My Dad's Weekends
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Segway has launched the Navimow X350, a robotic lawn mower featuring wire-free operation, high-precision GPS, and AI-powered obstacle avoidance. The mower, priced at $3,499, can manage up to 1.5 acres and is available through Amazon and Lowe's.

articles.title: Amazon is making a change users won't like
articles.author: Colette Bennett
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing a new AI-powered feature called Ad Video Generator to help sellers create video ads for their products. This free service, released in 2024, uses AI to generate video ads in approximately five minutes and is currently available to North American sellers with access to Sponsored Brands as product, supporting limited product categories with plans to expand.

articles.title: Diageo launches convenience store on-pack promotion across five RTDs
articles.author: Sunneva Moore
articles.summary: Diageo launched an on-pack promotion across five RTD lines, including Gordon's Gin & Tonic and Smirnoff Vodka & Cola, offering prizes like a trip to Ibiza. The promotion, running until August, encourages consumers to scan a QR code on the cans for a chance to win, with Diageo providing PoS displays to boost retailer sales.

articles.title: ZonaHub – A Free Marketplace For Nigerian Students
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: ZonaHub launched a free online marketplace platform tailored for Nigerian students. ZonaHub enables students to sell items, advertise services, find accommodation, and seek job opportunities at no cost. The platform aims to empower student hustlers by providing visibility and opportunities to earn and grow.

articles.title: Father's Day 2025: Top 5 tech gifts for your dad
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: iQOO has launched the Neo 10 smartphone, featuring the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset and a 7000mAh battery. Skullcandy introduced the Crusher ANC 2 headphones with adjustable bass and active noise cancellation. Haier released the TH27U1 smart vacuum cleaner with laser navigation. Viewsonic has launched the LX60HD projector with Full HD resolution and built-in Google TV, and Nuuk introduced the BFF Personal Hand Fan equipped with IceTouch technology.

articles.title: 5 gadgets I use to make my old car feel like a 2025 model
articles.author: Tanner Marlar
articles.summary: HUDWAY offers the HUDWAY Drive, a portable heads-up display. Kenwood provides stereo systems with features like HD camera integration and Garmin navigation. Compustar specializes in remote start features and security systems tailored to customer needs through dealer installations.

articles.title: From $40K to global brand: The entrepreneur who saw gold in socks
articles.author: Yajush Gupta
articles.summary: Swanky Socks, under Dorry Kordahi's leadership, has evolved from a small sock company into a global brand with over 2.5 million pairs sold. The company has secured corporate clients and a celebrity partnership with footballer Douglas Costa. This growth is attributed to Kordahi's vision of transforming socks into meaningful extensions of brand identity.

articles.title: Dora: AI website builder
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Dora is introduced as an AI-powered website builder offering a new solution for businesses to build their online presence. Dora can generate websites for any topic, tailoring designs to suit diverse needs such as showcasing products, sharing services, or creating blogs.

articles.title: Legendz sweepstakes casino review: Play 300+ games and redeem SC for real prizes in 2025
articles.author: Ryan Leaver
articles.summary: Legendz Casino introduces a sweepstakes casino where players can explore Vegas-style games using virtual currencies (GC and SC). New gamers are welcomed with a bonus of 500 GC + 3 SC, and the platform offers daily SC races and a five-tiered loyalty program. The casino also supports optional GC purchases and alternative prize redemptions for SC winnings.

articles.title: rabbit Officially Launches its Second Product
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: AI startup rabbit launched rabbit intern, an all-purpose AI agent designed to provide high-quality output such as websites and reports. rabbit intern is offered with task-based pricing structure; monthly plans are available for $99.99/month and annual subscription is available for $69.99/month. It is available at rabbit.tech/rabbit-intern.

articles.title: rabbit Officially Launches its Second Product
articles.author: Ryan Fenwick
articles.summary: AI startup rabbit has launched its second product, rabbit intern. rabbit intern is an AI agent designed to deliver high-quality outputs such as websites, reports, presentations, and games. It's rabbit's first software product, following the rabbit r1 AI-native hardware device.

articles.title: The viral Dyson Supersonic hair dryer is on sale for its cheapest price yet
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $100 discount on its Supersonic hair dryer, bringing the price down to $329 for the blue version. The Supersonic hair dryer features intelligent heat control and comes with five magnetic styling attachments for different hair types.

articles.title: Android 16: Release Date, Features, Devices & What's New
articles.author: Rukayat Badmus
articles.summary: Android 16 launched on June 10, 2025, for Google Pixel 6 and newer models, featuring updates like Live Activities, Material 3 design, and Advanced Protection Mode.  Other manufacturers like Samsung and Xiaomi will release their versions later in the year. The update is designed to improve user experience with enhanced security, multitasking, and AI integrations.

articles.title: Nutella Launches New Flavour For The First Time In 60 Years. Can You Guess?
articles.author: Jigyasa Kakwani
articles.summary: Ferrero's Nutella will introduce a new peanut flavor variant, blending cocoa, hazelnuts, and roasted peanuts. The new product, featuring a yellow lid and label, is scheduled to launch in North America in Spring 2026. This marks the first new flavor introduction in 60 years for the Nutella brand.

articles.title: rabbit Officially Launches its Second Product
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: AI startup rabbit launched rabbit intern, a general agent software. This is rabbit's second product, following the rabbit r1 AI-native hardware device.

articles.title: What's New in Android 16? Everything You Need to Know Right Now
articles.summary: Google launched Android 16 on June 10, 2025, for Google Pixel 6 and newer models, including the Pixel 7, 8, Pixel Fold, and Pixel Tablet. Android 16 introduces features such as Live Activities on the Lock Screen, Material 3 'Expressive' UI, Advanced Protection Mode and Desktop-Class Multitasking. The update also includes Auracast + LE Audio Support and Battery Health Stats.

articles.title: Lily AI Launches Solution to Optimize Product Content for Algorithmic and Generative Engine ...
articles.author: Lily Ai
articles.summary: Lily AI launched a new solution that enhances product content for SEO, AEO, and GEO. The new content optimization capabilities ensure products are found in Google Search and are understood by modern search engines like Gemini and ChatGPT. This drives eCommerce performance by helping retailers and brands resonate with high-intent consumers.

articles.title: Lily AI Launches Solution to Optimize Product Content for Algorithmic and Generative Engine Discoverability
articles.summary: Lily AI launched a new SEO and GEO content optimization solution. This solution utilizes AI to enrich, standardize, and optimize product content across ecommerce websites. The goal is to improve product discoverability, engagement, and drive growth for retailers and brands.

articles.title: Lily AI Launches Solution to Optimize Product Content for Algorithmic and Generative Engine ...
articles.author: Lily AI
articles.summary: Lily AI launched a new AI solution to help marketers optimize product content for better visibility in SEO, AEO, and GEO contexts. This solution ensures products are easily found in Google search and understood by modern search engines like Gemini and ChatGPT, ultimately driving improved eCommerce performance.

articles.title: The last bite: How a Minneapolis brand innovated on the mini corndog
articles.author: Brooks Johnson
articles.summary: Minneapolis-based brand launched TotDogs, a new product replacing corn dog batter with tater tots and wiener with chicken frank, in Target last fall with original and chili cheese flavors. It will be available on Walmart shelves next month. The brand aims to bring innovation to the mature corn dog category with a 'better-for-you' option.

articles.title: Lily AI Launches Solution to Optimize Product Content for Algorithmic and Generative Engine Discoverability
articles.author: Lily AI
articles.summary: Lily AI launched a new solution designed to optimize product content for better visibility on both traditional search engines and AI-driven platforms. This new solution enriches, standardizes, and optimizes product content to align with consumer search behavior and AI's interpretation of product information. Lily AI's solution provides features like AI-Ready Structured Data, Full-Funnel Query Intelligence & Bulk Content Refresh, and Shopper-Friendly Language to enhance product discoverability, engagement, and growth.

articles.title: Samsung's AI Camera: Smarter Image Search
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung plans to integrate advanced Generative AI into the camera system of its upcoming Galaxy Ultra smartphone. This will enable features like real-time object recognition, language translation, contextual information overlay, and improved image processing. The new Samsung Galaxy Ultra with Generative AI Camera is anticipated to be available in the first half of 2026.

articles.title: Wagamama unveils 'Food is Life' platform with customisable summer menu
articles.author: Ian Edmondson
articles.summary: Wagamama has launched a new brand platform called 'Food is Life' along with a new summer menu. The menu features customizable donburi rice bowls, pho noodle soups with yuzu broth and konjac noodles, new salads, non-alcoholic drinks such as Saffron Picante and Strawberry Spritz, and warm miso caramel banana bread for dessert.

articles.title: Dream Vegas casino bonus: Get a 100% up to £300 + 150 free spins
articles.author: James Anderson
articles.summary: Dream Vegas Casino introduces a new welcome offer for new players. This includes a 100% match bonus up to £300 on the first deposit and up to 150 free spins on NetEnt games, depending on the deposit amount.

articles.title: Guinness Draught Nitrosurge device in Amazon Father's Day cut-price deal
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a discounted price of £23 for the Guinness Nitrosurge device, which is designed to provide a pub-quality Guinness pour at home using ultrasonic technology. The device is compatible with special Nitrosurge cans, although some users have found ways to use it with regular Guinness cans as well.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 vs Nothing Phone 2: 5 major upgrades to expect this year
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Nothing, a UK-based smartphone brand, is launching its new generation flagship model, the Phone 3, on July 1. The Phone 3 is positioned as the company's first true flagship phone, featuring a major design revamp and performance upgrade compared to the Nothing Phone 2.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Ultra foldable phone to come with AI camera
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold Ultra, a new foldable phone with an enhanced AI-powered triple camera. This camera can translate languages and provide contextual information about the environment, offering a user-friendly experience. Samsung also emphasizes the device's durability and commitment to user privacy.

articles.title: How Essay Service Redefines Writing Standards for Students
articles.author: Academic pressure
articles.summary: EssayService is an academic writing platform offering customized, original papers. It connects students with vetted writers for essays, research papers, and dissertations. The platform features transparent pricing, direct writer selection, and plagiarism reports, making it a potentially reliable option for students needing academic support.

articles.title: nubia Unveils Pad Pro, Designed for Work, Study and Entertainment  Jun. 13, 2025 12:05
articles.summary: nubia has launched its first tablet, the nubia Pad Pro, designed for work, study, and entertainment. The nubia Pad Pro features a Qualcomm Snapdragon® 8 Gen 3 processor, a 10.9-inch 2.8K display, and is available in multiple memory configurations with prices starting at $419.

articles.title: 41 Must-Have Solutions For Summer Comfort
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article highlights several new summer-related products, including the Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Moisturizing Face SPF 60 Serum, Black Girl Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30, and Milani Make It Last Sunscreen Setting Spray / Primer with SPF 30, designed for sun protection. It also features the Veer Cruiser City wagon, designed to help families navigate outdoor activities, and a KitchenAid shaved ice attachment for summer treats.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra Teased To Feature AI-Powered Triple Rear Cameras, Slim & Light Design
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Samsung has teased the arrival of the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra, showcasing its slim design and triple-rear camera setup. The device is expected to feature an AI-powered imaging system and will be the 'thinnest, lightest, and most advanced foldable' from Samsung. The new foldable is expected to offer better specifications than the current-gen Fold.

articles.title: Sony isn't worried about the Switch 2 being the fastest-selling piece of Nintendo hardware ever, because you need the PS5 for "a great experience on big screens"
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2, a portable gaming console. Sony's PlayStation 5 focuses on immersive gaming experiences with the DualSense controller and aims to provide a unique offering for players and creators.

articles.title: Vivo X Fold 5 launching on June 25: Everything to know about the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 rival
articles.summary: Vivo is expected to launch the X Fold 5 in China on June 25th, with a potential India launch in July. The X Fold 5 features 8T LTPO panels with a 120Hz adaptive refresh rate, IP5X dust protection and IPX9+ water resistance, and a lighter, slimmer design. It is expected to be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, paired with up to 16GB RAM and 512GB storage and is rumored to potentially offer support for Apple's ecosystem.

articles.title: Lidl just dropped ‘spectacular' new bakery item — and it only costs 79p
articles.author: Courtney Pochin
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced a new Birthday Cake Bun in its in-store bakery, priced at 79p, featuring pink icing and rainbow sprinkles. Tesco has launched Matilda Cake in collaboration with Studio Bakery, a giant chocolate cake slice priced at £16 and designed to serve 10 people.

articles.title: The Morning After: Our verdict on the Switch 2
articles.author: Mat Smith
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the successor to the Nintendo Switch, featuring a larger 7.9-inch LCD screen and upgraded performance. Nothing is preparing to launch the Nothing Phone 3, which will be available for purchase from Amazon or directly from the company and will support 4G and 5G with AT&T and T-Mobile.

articles.title: Tree Hut gets a ‘grown-up' sister brand
articles.author: Howard Ruben
articles.summary: Naterra has launched a new body care brand called Bdy, positioned as the 'grown-up evolution' of Tree Hut. Bdy debuted exclusively at Ulta Beauty with a collection of seven SKUs priced between $12 and $29, focusing on skincare-inspired ingredients and dermatologist testing for sensitive skin types.

articles.title: ESScent Of The Week: This Lychee Perfume Is The Fruity, Feel-Good Scent Of Summer
articles.author: Kimberly Wilson
articles.summary: The 7 Virtues launched Candied Lychee, a fragrance featuring lychee notes with hints of peony, vanilla, and amber. It is described as a wearable lychee fragrance with good staying power and projection and is suitable for daytime wear. The fragrance can be layered with other scents like Glossier You or Tom Ford Bitter Peach.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 launching soon in India and here is everything we know about it so far
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the upcoming launch of the Galaxy Z Fold 7, expected in mid-July, featuring a bigger display, improved camera with a 200-megapixel main sensor, and a slimmer design. The phone is rumored to have an 8-inch internal display and is expected to start at Rs 1,64,999.

articles.title: Review: Why HP's OmniBook X marks the next-gen of business laptops
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: HP launched the OmniBook X, a sleek, AI-powered business laptop featuring Qualcomm's Snapdragon X Elite processor, up to 32GB of RAM, and 1TB of SSD storage. The laptop offers up to 26-28 hours of battery life, a 14-inch 2.8K OLED display, and enhanced audio and camera quality for professionals.

articles.title: 10 fashion and beauty must-haves from M&S, Sephora and more
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Next released a new linen-blend dress priced at £34, available in sizes 6-26. Roman is offering the Ivory Collarless Boucle Jacket on sale for £42. Laneige's Water Bank Cream Moisturiser is a new hydrating product with positive customer reviews, while Charlotte Tilbury introduced the Unreal Skin Sheer Glow Tint Hydrating Foundation Stick for £35. Rehab launched the Sunshine Spritz Hair & Body Shimmer Mist, priced at £26, and Inkey List released the Hydro-Surge Dewy Face Mist for £11. Boux Avenue has a new check crinkle cotton short pyjama set for £22.

articles.title: 42 Amazon Products So Damn Good You'll Hit "Buy Now" Without Even Bothering To Hit "Add To Cart"
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Neutrogena launched Collagen Bank Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30. The Pink Stuff introduced "Sqeezy" sponge set. First Aid Beauty released Facial Radiance Pads. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream. NeeDoh released "Dream Drop" fidget toy. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder. Skala launched Mais Cacho Hair 2-in-1 Conditioning Treatment. Olay released Super Serum Body Wash. Aloderma launched Organic Aloe Vera Gel. NYX launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum. E.l.f. launched Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops. Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Clinique released Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Medicube launched Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer. Oxo released compact Brew Rapid Brewer. I Dew Care launched travel-friendly applicator of dry shampoo powder.

articles.title: ‘I risked all my savings': S'porean launches skincare brand ‘Senzo', shares experience being a first-time business owner
articles.author: Trixy Toh
articles.summary: Senzo, a new skincare brand founded by Sabrina, has launched its first product: a clarifying mist formulated with hypochlorous acid. The mist is designed to prevent breakouts and soothe irritation. Sabrina invested her savings into the company and documented the entire product launch process to build trust with potential customers.

articles.title: Lava Storm Play and Storm Lite 5G launched: 120Hz display, 50MP camera and more under Rs 10,000
articles.summary: Lava has launched two new budget 5G smartphones, the Storm Play and Storm Lite, as additions to its Storm series. The Lava Storm Play is priced starting at Rs 9,999, while the Storm Lite is priced starting at Rs 7,999, and will be available for purchase via Amazon starting June 19 and June 24, respectively. Both phones include features like a 6.75-inch HD+ screen with a 120Hz refresh rate, MediaTek Dimensity chipsets, and run on Android 15.

articles.title: Celebrate father's day with a fragrance that reflects his personality
articles.summary: ITC Engage's Fragrance Expert, Prajakta Kanegaonkar, gives advice on finding the perfect fragrance for fathers based on their personality, presence, and preferences. The advice given implicitly promotes ITC Engage's fragrance products.

articles.title: Weekly Recap: 16 Consumer Press Releases You Need to See
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NESCAFÉ launched Espresso Lemonade Hack, Wilson Sporting Goods introduced a new Signature Basketball Collection, Airstream launched a Limited Edition Travel Trailer, GREY GOOSE debuted a new global campaign, OnePay and Synchrony launched a new credit card program, Urban Outfitters unveiled a pride vinyl collection, Chipotle launched Adobo Ranch, Culver's revamped its sandwich lineup, Lowe's tapped into the creator economy to launch a home improvement creator network, HERSHEY'S KISSES launched Pokémon Foils, Terra Mare launched a women's wellness brand, Friendly's launched an anniversary ice cream magic with Jonas Brothers, Cheez-It and Wendy's launched Limited-Edition Baconator Crackers, and M&M'S launched Jurassic World Rebirth Packs.

articles.title: Dyson V12 vacuum gets huge £190 discount
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a promotional price for its V12 Absolute Slim vacuum cleaner, reducing the price from £549.99 to £399 for a limited time. Shoppers can get an additional 10% discount by signing up for Dyson's newsletter, further lowering the price to £359.99. The V12 Absolute Slim features strong suction and a lightweight design, suitable for both hard floors and carpets, and includes a Motorbar cleaner head and hair screw tool.

articles.title: Ready or Not Launches July 15 for PS5 and Xbox Series X
articles.author: William D'Angelo
articles.summary: VOID Interactive will launch the tactical first-person shooter game "Ready or Not" for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S on July 15. The game will also be available on PC via Epic Games Store and Xbox PC.

articles.title: 3 ‘futures thinking' techniques to stay relevant in a changing world
articles.author: Glenn San Luis
articles.summary: Inquirer Academy is launching a workshop titled "Futures Thinking for Brand Strategy: Anticipating Changes and Staying Relevant" on July 11, 2025, in Makati City. The workshop aims to equip brand leaders with anticipatory intelligence. Inquirer Academy also offers customized workshops, webinars, and online courses.

articles.title: This 5G Android Phone Brings a 120Hz Smooth Display for Under ₹8,000
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Lava Storm Lite 5G, a budget-friendly smartphone featuring a 120Hz display, splash-proof design, and Android 15. Priced starting at ₹7,999, it includes MediaTek's Dimensity 6400 chipset, a 50MP camera, and a 5000mAh battery, with availability on Amazon from June 24.

articles.title: 33 Travel Products You'll Use For Every Summer Trip
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new travel-related products. These products include the Merit's The Minimalist Perfecting Complexion Stick, Subtl's Beauty Stack, I Dew Care's dry shampoo powder, among others. These new introductions aim to enhance convenience and space-saving during travel.

articles.title: Little Mountain Phone and Computer Repair aims to bring small business tech to consumers
articles.author: Bryson Durst
org: Little Mountain Phone and Computer Repair
articles.summary: Little Mountain Phone and Computer Repair offers repair services for devices, data recovery, and custom gaming computers.  The company plans to launch the Little Mountain Computer Club, providing managed IT services like antivirus, backup, and remote support to subscribed home users. A grand opening event is planned to highlight these services.

articles.title: Ping Edge to expand product range amid rising market demand
articles.summary: Ping Edge Technology Bhd is expanding its product range to include bakery equipment, food processors, and other kitchen-related items. The company also plans to upgrade its digital platforms with business intelligence tools and enhance customer service. Additionally, Ping Edge will establish new showrooms in Negeri Sembilan, Johor, and Penang to improve accessibility and service coverage.

articles.title: Stand Out with Creative Visuals – Expert Services for Your Brand
articles.summary: The expert Video Production Marketing services help brands to tell their story through compelling visuals. These services assist with launching new products, running online stores, and growing social media presence. The service handles video production from script to screen.

articles.title: Father's Day: A guide to buying dad a gift that has meaning
articles.author: Hein Kaiser
articles.summary: The article suggests a Solenco wine cooler with a decanter and Mill Portable Wi-Fi heater as potential gifts. It also recommends Japanese whiskies like Santori Toki and Hibiki Japanese Harmoney, and wines like Meerlust Rubicon. T-shirts from The Atlas Bear and Big Blue are mentioned as personalized gift options.

articles.title: Modern ESLint Configurator for Next.js
articles.author: Nilesh Viduranga
articles.summary: The author built Yae Lint Config to simplify ESLint configuration. This tool allows users to generate lint config files automatically via a command-line interface, addressing issues with ESLint 9's Flat Configs.

articles.title: Airis NEO P40000: Redefining Disposable Vapes, Delivering a Premium Experience of Pure and Smooth Vaping
articles.author: Shenzhen Airis Electronic Co.
articles.summary: Airis has launched the NEO P40000, a new disposable e-cigarette featuring an intelligent monitoring system, triple-core ultra-fast vaporization, five-level nicotine adjustment, and 15 authentic flavors. The NEO P40000 delivers up to 40,000 puffs and incorporates a smart chip displaying battery level, e-liquid remaining, and nicotine strength.

articles.title: Jetour drives affordable luxury SUV with X70
articles.author: Daily Trust
articles.summary: Jetour Nigeria introduced the newest edition of the Jetour X70, an award-winning Crossover Sports Utility Vehicle. The Jetour X70, which was first introduced in 2018, is the flagship product of the Jetour brand.

articles.title: BrightRay Skincare: West African Natural Care for Radiant Skin
articles.author: Jasmine McBride
articles.summary: BrightRay, a skincare brand, is expanding its product line to include sugar scrubs and massage oils. These new products continue the brand's mission of holistic natural care, complementing their existing range of body butters.

articles.title: Is Google about to destroy the web?
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new AI Mode to its search engine, which will replace traditional search results with AI-generated responses. This new service has the potential to reduce traffic to websites, impacting their business models and revenue. While Google believes AI Mode will enhance search, critics worry about its effects on the open web and the diversity of information available.

articles.title: Renault Duster and Bigster: Launch and more details of Renault's comeback cars in India
articles.summary: Renault plans to re-launch the Duster and introduce the Bigster, a seven-seater variant, in the first quarter of next year. The new Duster will feature a modern look while retaining its rugged design DNA, and will come with petrol, diesel, CNG, and mild-hybrid engine options. The Bigster, based on the same platform as the Duster, will offer three-row seating and a larger boot space.

articles.title: AI gift ideas for Gen Z, your gran and your weird uncle – here's what ChatGPT picked
articles.author: Marc Reeves
articles.summary: ChatGPT service suggests a variety of gift ideas, acting like a product recommendation engine for diverse demographics like Gen Z and grandparents. The suggestions range from tech gadgets like LED sunset projectors and skincare fridges to practical items like heated foot spas and beer-making kits, showcasing ChatGPT's adaptability in offering personalized recommendations.

articles.title: 「水獭吨吨」上新'东方茉莉'茶鲜萃液
articles.author: 刀法研究所
articles.summary: 水獭吨吨 launched its first tea extract product, '东方茉莉', on June 13th. The new product is made from jasmine flowers and features zero sugar and artificial flavoring. It utilizes nitrogen to preserve freshness and is available on the company's Tmall flagship store.

articles.title: FAW Toyota launches new bZ5 electric SUV
articles.author: Global Data
articles.summary: FAW Toyota Motor Company has launched the new bZ5 battery-powered SUV in China, offering four variants with prices ranging from CNY 129,800 to CNY 159,800. The bZ5 models offer ranges of 550 km or 630 km and include features such as a central touchscreen and 5G connectivity, aiming to compete with the Tesla Model Y.

articles.title: https://www.facebook.com/groups/getalphaboostprocanada/
articles.summary: Alpha Boost Pro is being marketed to improve male sexual performance, specifically to enhance arousal and sensations.  The product aims to improve sexual experience. Various websites and social media platforms promote this product.

articles.title: Experience VOOPOO's Latest iCOSM CODE 2.0 & Next-Gen Innovations at World Vape Show Dubai 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: VOOPOO will showcase its latest vaping innovations at the World Vape Show Dubai 2025, including the ARGUS Top Fill Cartridge V2 with iCOSM 2.0 technology, featuring the ARGUS G3, ARGUS G3 mini, and ARGUS Klyc. The company will also offer a preview of the VOOPOO VINCI E80 and upgraded VMATE product with enhanced features.

articles.title: Zoom Reimagines Customer Experience With Agentic AI
articles.summary: Zoom has launched agentic AI capabilities for its Customer Experience platform (ZCX), featuring an upgraded Zoom Virtual Agent and new AI tools for real-time analytics and Quality Management (QM). The upgraded Zoom Virtual Agent now incorporates agentic AI, enabling autonomous resolution of complex tasks and personalized support, launching with integration across platforms like Zoom Contact Center, Genesys Cloud, Salesforce, ServiceNow, Zendesk, and Microsoft Dynamics. Additionally, Zoom introduces new analytics and quality management updates, including CX Analytics, CX Insights (planned for later this year), AI Scheduling, AI Topic Detection, and Advanced Quality Management (now available with Zoom Contact Center Elite licenses or as an add-on at $60 per seat).

articles.title: https://www.facebook.com/Alpha.Boost.Pro.In.USA/
articles.summary: Alpha Boost Pro is a supplement designed to enhance male sexual performance. The product aims to improve arousal and increase sensations.  Multiple online platforms promote the product, indicating a marketing initiative.

articles.title: I used an AI stylist for five days and hated it
articles.author: Pooja Singh
articles.summary: Glance AI and Slayrobe are two newly launched AI platforms that act as personal stylists. Glance AI creates shoppable looks based on user input, while Slayrobe offers wardrobe organization and style suggestions with links to product websites. Both target Gen Z and millennial consumers, aiming to curate fashion choices and provide personalized recommendations.

articles.title: Black IT develops software for discount control
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced a new central discount control system to revolutionize discount management across foreign markets. The system, developed with Schwarz IT and Stackit, replaces previous software and aims to enhance efficiency. This new system is also being extended to other entities within the Schwarz Group.

articles.title: Get 33% Off the ghd Max Professional Hair Straightener
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 33% discount on the ghd Max Professional Hair Straightener. The straightener features wider plates, dual-zone technology for consistent heat, and promises a frizz-free finish with more shine. ghd promotes the product as a styling essential designed for performance and protection.

articles.title: This Father's Day, elevate your father's grooming game with the right scent
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: ITC Engage, through its fragrance expert Prajakta Kanegaonkar, is introducing curated fragrance profiles for Father's Day. ITC Engage's range includes fragrances like Amber Hues with woody notes for the classic gentleman, and other scents suited for modern minimalists, adventurers, romantics, trendsetters, professionals, and those who prefer a relaxed casual style. These profiles aim to help customers select fragrances that match their father's personality and lifestyle.

articles.title: Lava Storm Lite 5G Launched in India With MediaTek Dimensity 6400 Processor; Check Price, Offers, Sale Date, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles launched the Lava Storm Lite 5G in India, featuring the MediaTek Dimensity 6400 processor, a 50MP camera, and a 6.75-inch HD+ display. The smartphone will be available starting June 19, 2025, on Amazon for INR 7,999.

articles.title: Samsung engineers the most advanced Galaxy Z yet
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has refined its Galaxy Z series, resulting in the thinnest, lightest, and most advanced foldable phone to date. The new Galaxy Z series builds upon the original Galaxy Fold, combining portability with productivity by focusing on design improvements and durability.

articles.title: https://www.facebook.com/GetAlphaBoostPro/
articles.summary: Alpha Boost Pro aims to improve arousal and enhance sensations in the bedroom. It is marketed as a product designed to make users better in the bedroom.

articles.title: Samsung Confirms The Galaxy Z Fold 7 Series Will Be Its Thinnest Foldable This Year
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, emphasizing a thinner and lighter design. The new foldable will include Galaxy AI features, improved durability, and aim to offer a more portable and functional experience. The company has released teasers hinting at significant design and hardware updates.

articles.title: Three Pepper Jelly flavours launched under agri innovation initiative
articles.author: Stabroek News
org: National Agricultural Research and Extension Institute
articles.summary: Three new Pepper Jelly flavors, including Extreme Pepper Jelly, Pepper Jelly, and Hot and Heated Pepper Jelly, were launched at Massy Stores Mega, MovieTowne, Turkeyen, under the Ministry of Agriculture's AIEP initiative. The product is available in 380ml and a smaller size and is a collaboration between the Ministry of Agriculture, NAREI, and GSA.

articles.title: This $5 Gel Banishes Grime From Nooks And Crannies
articles.author: Leigh Weingus
articles.summary: Amazon is selling a car-cleaning putty for under $5. This reusable gel effectively removes dust and crumbs from car vents, cupholders, keyboards, and other surfaces. The product has received numerous positive reviews praising its effectiveness and lack of residue.

articles.title: 2025 Genesis Electrified G80 price and specs
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: Genesis Australia has released full specifications for its updated Electrified G80 luxury sedan. The updated vehicle features a larger battery, improved range, tweaked safety and interior technology, and a new long-wheelbase body.

articles.title: Android 16: Phone to PC
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google's Android 16 introduces Native Desktop Mode, transforming Pixel devices into functional computers when connected to an external screen. This feature, currently in beta for Pixel 8 and higher models, offers a desktop-like interface with floating windows, a taskbar, and full mouse and keyboard support, enhancing multitasking and portability.

articles.title: Fife marketing guru who worked with Nike now helps local firms take on ‘big boys'
articles.author: Dylan Lockhart
org: Centre of Golf Excellence St Andrews
articles.summary: Local Heroes is assisting Vivimus Water, a mineral water firm from St Monans, with the launch of a new product. This collaboration is part of Local Heroes' mission to support local businesses with their marketing strategies.

articles.title: Lily AI Launches Solution to Optimize Product Content for Algorithmic and Generative Engine Discoverability
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Lily AI launched a new solution to optimize product content for algorithmic and generative engine discoverability.  This solution helps marketers enhance product content for better visibility within traditional Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and emerging Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) contexts. It ensures products are found in Google search and understood by modern search engines, ultimately driving eCommerce performance.

articles.title: nubia Unveils Pad Pro, Designed for Work, Study and Entertainment
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: nubia has launched its first tablet, the nubia Pad Pro, designed for work, study, and entertainment. The nubia Pad Pro features a Qualcomm Snapdragon® 8 Gen 3 processor, a 10.9-inch 2.8K ultra-clear true-color screen, and DTS X® Ultra spatial 3D sound. It is available globally, in the EU, the UK, and Mexico.

articles.title: 29 Kitchen Products You'll Use Multiple Times A Day
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Ninja introduces the Crispi Air Fryer system and the compact Ninja Foodi 2-in-1 Flip Toaster with oven capabilities. Emeril Lagasse launches a dual-zone air fryer with multiple cooking functions. Dawn releases the Platinum Powerwash dish spray, while Scrub Daddy offers a soap-dispensing attachment and Oxo introduces the compact Brew Rapid Brewer. Caraway offers a 12-piece ceramic, nonstick cookware set, and Anyday provides microwaveable cooking essentials and Mike's Hot Honey launches a 12-ounce bottle of Hot Honey.

articles.title: nubia Unveils Pad Pro, Designed for Work, Study and Entertainment
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Nubia has launched its first tablet, the nubia Pad Pro, designed for work, study, and entertainment. The nubia Pad Pro features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, a 10.9-inch 2.8K display, and is available in multiple variants with different RAM and storage options, priced from $419 to $599.

articles.title: Anti Social Social Club Unveils First Global Flagship in Seoul
articles.author: Tianwei Zhang
articles.summary: Anti Social Social Club is opening its first global flagship store in Seoul, South Korea, in collaboration with Kasina. The store will feature exclusive collections, a rotating display of vintage cars, and a customization program. New product releases are planned weekly, marking the brand's expansion into brick-and-mortar retail.

articles.title: Win a $100K Truck! New Range Launch Giveaway!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Isuzu Trucks launched a Ready-to-Work NLR 45-150 Traypack, designed to be driven on a car license, targeting independent contractors and small business owners. The launch includes a three-year Total Service Agreement and a VIP Supercars experience, highlighting a trend toward bundled services.

articles.title: Bengaluru: App for locating parking spots in city
articles.author: DHNS
articles.summary: Nitin Prabhakar founded an app. The app is designed to provide information about parking spaces at a given location. The app suggests nearby alternatives if none are available on-site.

articles.title: 隨身智能助手，漢王N10 Pro二代手寫電紙本
articles.author: 新浪網
org: 漢王是國內較早開始使用【減屏層】設計的廠商，通過去除電容層和導光板，可以使墨水屏上層屏幕厚度減少
對比下面漫畫顯示效果，兩款產品均支援
articles.summary: Hanvon has launched the N10 Pro 2nd generation e-reader, featuring an upgraded anti-glare screen, AI integration, and improved performance. The e-reader includes capabilities for note-taking, voice transcription, AI assistance, and access to various reading platforms, with a focus on enhancing reading and productivity for students and professionals. It is currently available for purchase at 京東 (Jingdong) for 2999元, with discounts and additional gifts.

articles.title: BYD's model onslaught continues as another off-roader teased
articles.author: Riz Akhtar
articles.summary: BYD's Fang Cheng Bao brand launched the Tai 3, a fully electric off-road SUV, with prices starting at $A30,500. The Tai 3 features BYD's LFP blade batteries, an optional drone launch pad, and impressive charging capabilities. A teaser image suggests a larger SUV, the Tai 7, is forthcoming.

articles.title: 618要買洗烘一體機？！雙綠標認證石頭Z1 Plus
articles.author: 新浪網
articles.summary: Stone has launched the Z1 Plus washing and drying machine, featuring innovative molecular sieve technology for enhanced drying performance. The Z1 Plus includes a steam wrinkle removal function, a mousse washing liquid system, and a dual intelligent dispensing box. Priced under 4000 yuan, it offers a comprehensive washing and drying solution.

articles.title: Next's £34 dress get shoppers 'so many compliments' they buy more than one
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next offers the Mini Sleeveless Racer Stretch Linen Blend Dress priced at £34-£36 and the Forever Comfort Slot Mule Sandals for £22. Nobody's Child sells the Linen-Blend Palermo Mini Dress priced at £49-£89, while La Redoute offers the Mini Flared Sleeveless Dress in Linen reduced to £31.89.

articles.title: Can AI finally fix online shopping? A hands-on test of GlanceAI and Google Try-On
articles.author: Jason St. Angelo
articles.summary: GlanceAI, a free virtual styling app, allows users to upload a selfie and receive personalized outfit recommendations. Google's new Try-On tool, available within Google Search Labs, utilizes generative AI to display how clothes look on a user's actual body, leveraging Google's Shopping Graph to track and update product listings.

articles.title: We Found the Best Mosquito Repellents That Aren't Bug Spray at Amazon
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: Gootop is offering its Bug Zapper, a device that attracts and zaps flying insects, at a discounted price on Amazon. Thermacell is providing a Mosquito Repellent starter kit, which creates a mosquito-free zone, also on sale. Summit's Pack of 6 Mosquito Dunks, designed to eliminate mosquito larvae in standing water, are available on Amazon.

articles.title: Nvidia Wants To Build A Planet-Scale AI Factory With DGX Cloud Lepton
articles.author: Janakiram MSV
articles.summary: Nvidia relaunched Lepton AI as DGX Cloud Lepton in June 2025, providing a unified AI platform and marketplace connecting developers to GPUs from various cloud providers. DGX Cloud Lepton supports interactive development, batch jobs, and inference endpoints, and it is in preview with sign-up available for early access.

articles.title: [의학칼럼] 나이 들며 찾아오는 눈의 혼탁 '백내장'… 안과 검진 필요한 이유
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: Honda is launching the new 2025 CRV model. The 2025 Honda CRV is considered breathtaking.

articles.title: Zoom Reimagines Customer Experience With Agentic AI
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Zoom launched agentic AI capabilities for its customer experience platform (ZCX). This is a major advancement for its next-gen contact center solutions.

articles.title: Driving Innovation: Lenovo and F1® Embracing an AI Future Together to Boost Technical Operations
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Formula 1® and Lenovo have successfully trialed Lenovo's AI-powered solution. This collaboration suggests an introduction or update of AI-driven services or products within Formula 1®.

articles.title: Ericsson and Google Cloud team up to deliver carrier-grade 5G core as-a-service built with AI at the foundation
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Ericsson launched Ericsson On-Demand. Ericsson On-Demand delivers core network services. The delivered core network services function as a SaaS platform.

articles.title: Android Circuit: Android 16 Launches, Nothing Tech Turns To North America, Latest Galaxy Z Fold7 Details
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: Google released Android 16 with accessibility improvements and dynamic notifications. Samsung is teasing the Galaxy Z Fold 7 with a Snapdragon processor. Nothing Tech is launching its flagship Nothing Phone (3) in North America.

articles.title: Scale Your Laser Engraving Business with Monport's Mid-Year Deals on CO2 & Fiber Laser Machines
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: Monport laser has officially kicked off something.

articles.title: Ariana Grande's 'divine' perfume with 16k five-star ratings has price cut on Amazon
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Ariana Grande's Cloud perfume is available for purchase on Amazon.

articles.title: PlayStation Says Marathon Is Learning From Concord's Mistakes As It Doubles-Down On Live Service Gaming ...
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: Sony plans to launch live service games, viewing them as a significant opportunity despite associated challenges. Helldivers 2 is considered an early success, while Concord faced challenges upon release.

articles.title: AMD sees AI chip market exceeding $500 bn by 2028, launches MI350 Series GPU to ...
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The company launched a developer cloud access service.

articles.title: Shhh Silk Launches the World's First AI-Powered Sleep Concierge
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Shhh Silk, a luxury silk sleepwear and accessories brand, launched The Sleep Concierge by Shhh Silk. This new service is the world's first AI-powered sleep ritual assistant, designed to transform nightly routines.

articles.title: This Slick New Sports Yacht Just Made Its Global Debut In Venice
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Ferretti Group launched the all-new GTX70 yacht under its Pershing brand. The GTX70 debuted at the Salone Nautico Venezia 2025.

articles.title: Fark Weird News Quiz - June 13, 2025 (Hard Version)
articles.summary: Gucci is offering a classic silk necktie from their Father's Day section for $230. The necktie features the GG logo, an established symbol of Gucci's heritage, and the Web stripe.
